price: (53) That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed?'"
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban waʿiẓāman a-innā lamadīnūna
